alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 04 at 3:50PM CST until February 05 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected. * WHERE...Coastal Nueces, Coastal Kleberg, Coastal Calhoun, Coastal Refugio, Aransas Islands, Coastal San Patricio, Coastal Aransas, Calhoun Islands, Kleberg Islands and Nueces Islands Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
